SENTHILKUMAR SHANMUGAM

 Highly motivated Technical Specialist and Technical Lead with around Eighteen Plus years of rich experience 
in complex software designing, Microservices architecture, J2EE architecture, service-oriented architecture, 
distributed multi-tier architecture,  web-based  architecture,  Testing,  Deployment, 24/7  production  support, 
and SDLC methodology. 
 Good  experience managing  an  onsite/offshore  project  (Coordination,  Estimation,  project  planning and 
allocation, preparing SOW, driving the project, and Object-Oriented Methodologies like Agile/SCRUM). 
 Worked with AWS services/components like S3, IAM, EC2, AMI, ECS, Docker EKS, Kubernetes, API Gateway, 
Elastic Search, Cloud watch, Lambda, Amazon SQS & SNS. 
 Expert in implementing Kafka and Apache Camel.

Stored Procedures,  Triggers, Functions, and Packages as well as writing DDL,  DML, and  Transaction queries 
with development tools like TOAD and PL SQL Developer. 
 Experience using MongoDB in one of the projects, it is a cross-platform document-oriented database program 
(NoSQL database program). 
 Experience in TDD (Test Driven Development) using Junit and build tools such as ANT, and  Maven to compile, 
and package the components using Jenkins. 
 Experience in Continuous code quality tools like SonarQube and Cobertura.  
 Excellent team   player, communication,   interpersonal,   intuitive,   administrative,   problem   solving, and 
leadership skills.

North & South Carolina Department of Labor, Atlanta, GA  (January 2020 – Present) 
Project: Unemployment Benefits Integration (SCUBI) - Lead Application Developer 
Responsibilities: 
 Analyzed Business Requirement Document for comments regarding Technical Implementation. 
 Developed business components using Spring Boot, and Spring Annotations and created business 
implementation services. 
 Designed and developed REST-based Microservice using Spring Boot, and Spring Data with JPA. 
 Involved AWS services/components like S3, IAM, EC2, AMI, ECS, API Gateway, SNS, and SQS. 
 Experienced in developing containerization using EKS, ECR, Fargate, and Docker. 
 Worked on AWS S3 bucket for persisting Micro service configurations retrieval and storage. 
 Implemented various design patterns in the project such as Business Delegate, Session Façade, Data 
Transfer Object, Data Access Object, Service Locator, Singleton, and Multi-tenant.

framework. 
 Experience configuring the build/deploy using Jenkin and configured blue/green deployment like 
deploying the artifacts into AWS Container for continuous integration & deployment (CI/CD). 
 
Environment: JDK 8 & 17, Spring, Spring Boot, RESTful APIs, AWS, Microservices, Docker, Kubernetes, Angular 
4, Node JS, Mockito, Maven 3.2.3, Jenkins, JPA, Transact-SQL, SQL SERVER, Mongo DB, Contrast.

Professional Experience

SENTHILKUMAR SHANMUGAM 
senthilkumarmsit@gmail.com

ADP, Atlanta, GA (May 2019 - January 2020) 
Project: CRMS - Lead Application Developer 
Responsibilities: 
 Developed Microservices to provide RESTful API utilizing Spring Boot with Spring MVC. 
 Implemented Apache Camel to build the router for each Rest Service and used Kafka to support 
streaming API processes. 
 Designed and developed a 24x7 Replay application to Support the Offline Queueing Process for each 
Rest call during the application maintenance downtime. 
 Created complex database queries using Transact-SQL and invoking those from Rest services. 
 Involved in elastic search implementation for complex searches. 
 Integrated Amazon Cloud Watch with Amazon EC2 instances to monitor log files and tracking metrics 
(POC). 
 Secured API's by implementing OAuth 2.0 token-based authentication using Spring Security. 
 Used tools such as Maven and Jenkins for Build Process and configuration management.

Cache 2, SQL, Git, RESTful APIs, Angular 4, STS 4, Rally, Jenkins build tool, Splunk 7.
